channel.title: Trying to make a spawn server?
channel.description: Yes, if i gave users the rights for spawning how would I make it so they cannot get any type of party hats or any rares i dont want them to get like p ring.

item.title: Trying to make a spawn server?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

create an array of items then iterate through them if the attempted spawned item if in the array, return.

Read full topic
